definition: (botany) an isolated thickening of tissue, especially a stiff protuberance on the lip of an orchid, to form a callus or calluses
details:
noun
- (botany) an isolated thickening of tissue, especially a stiff protuberance on the lip of an orchid
- bony tissue formed during the healing of a fractured bone
- an area of skin that is thick or hard from continual pressure or friction (as the sole of the foot)
= synonyms: callosity
verb
- to form a callus or calluses
= example: to form a callus or calluses
- to cause a callus to form on
= example: to cause a callus to form on
